meanings.definition: The act or process of making a duplicate photographic copy.
meanings.sent1: Photoduplication is when you make a second photo that looks exactly like the first one.
meanings.sent2: I needed to do photoduplication of an important document for safekeeping.
meanings.sent3: The photoduplication machine decided to take a break right when I needed it the most.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a photoduplication, capturing every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The photoduplication process ensures that you always have a backup of your photos.
